post.summary: Retrieve user orders
post.description: This API is used to fetch a list of orders made by a customer.

post.summary: Retrieve detailed information for a specific order
Retrieve the user's cart item count
post.description: Returns the total number of items present in the customer's cart.

post.summary: Subscribe or manage user newsletter preferences
post.description: Allows users to subscribe to or update their newsletter subscription using email or mobile.

post.summary: Notify the user when a product is back in stock
post.description: Allows a user to subscribe to restock notifications for a specific product variant.

post.summary: General Address API
post.description: Handles address information for the user, potentially related to cart or checkout.

post.summary: Update the user's cart
post.description: This API updates the cart with new data like updated items, cart metadata, or session-based updates.

post.summary: Retrieve list of arriving orders for the user
post.description: This API returns orders that are expected to arrive for the customer.

get.description: This API retrieves the terms and conditions based on the specified type such as "offer" or "membership".
This API retrieves basic configuration and detail information for a specific shop.
This API returns details for product categories, including category name and metadata.
This API fetches category data using one or multiple category IDs and an optional category name.

post.summary: Save or update brand preferences for the user
post.description: This API is used to store brand preferences for the user, which may include selected brands, geolocation, and versioning info.

get.description: This API fetches a list of stores based on user geolocation, services, and category preferences.

get.summary: Retrieve available cities for user location
get.description: This API returns city-level location data based on the user's session and geolocation context.

get.summary: Get available filters for Product Listing Page (PLP)
get.description: This API returns the available filters (e.g., colors, customization, personalization) for the PLP based on the provided context.

schema.description: List of filter categories and available values

get.description: Returns the number of lookbooks based on filters such as category, search keywords, pagination, and sorting criteria.
This API returns the preferred product categories for a user based on gender and brand.

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

get.summary: Get city and state details based on postcode
get.description: This API returns the corresponding city and state for a given postcode and brand, used for auto-filling location fields during checkout or profile updates.

200.description: Successfully retrieved city and state details

post.summary: Get game campaign information
post.description: This API provides information related to the user's eligibility and metadata for game-based campaigns (e.g., cricket promotions).

post.summary: Get fit guidance for a product category
post.description: Returns fit information based on the selected category to help users understand sizing for reviews or purchase.

200.description: Successfully returned fit information for the category

400.description: Invalid request format or missing parameters

post.summary: Resolve user location based on IP and geo context
post.description: This API resolves the user’s location using IP address and geolocation to enhance personalization and service availability.

schema.description: City, state, region, and other location metadata

400.description: Bad request - invalid or incomplete parameters

post.summary: Submit store call data for a specific user and store
post.description: This API logs or processes data for a store-related action, such as contacting or locating a store, based on customer and store context.

get.summary: Get breadcrumb trail for a category
get.description: Returns the breadcrumb navigation structure based on the category and shop details to help users orient within site hierarchy.

post.summary: Fetch autocomplete suggestions
post.description: This API provides typeahead search suggestions based on a keyword and filtering preferences such as brand, category, or product name.

filter.example: type:BRAND OR type:CATEGORY OR type:DefaultCategoryName OR type:PRODUCT

400.description: Bad request or missing search term

post.summary: Get price and size guide details for a product
post.description: This API returns pricing, size fitting, and availability details for a given product, customized by category, brand, and user location.

200.description: Successfully returned price and size guide details

schema.description: Price ranges, size availability, and fitting guidance

get.description: Returns a list of predefined reasons for a user to contact customer support, filtered by brand and personalization criteria.

post.summary: Retrieve order details for a guest user
post.description: This API fetches details of an order placed by a guest (non-logged-in) user using their mobile number and order ID.

schema.description: Contains order status, items, and support-related metadata
